subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Melvin Mora, who has not reached the playoffs since 1999 when he was a Mets rookie, signed a one-year, $1.3 million contract with the Colorado Rockies, who have reached the postseason in two of the last three years.
snippet: Melvin Mora, who has not reached the playoffs since 1999 when he was a Mets rookie, signed a one-year, $1.3 million contract with the Colorado Rockies, who have reached the postseason in two of the last three years.
